review_text: Highly informative course. Great job
Very clear and informative!
extremely well informed and the delivery was clear and concise.
Great content and way to deliver the message. Very relevant, concise, clear and really really useful.

The course was ok but very scattered and repetitive at times. Some of Mr. Gil's slides were non-existent as he reviewed his important points in certain sections. Also, the use Fiverr section was the longest module and least beneficial to me. I think most people know to outsource to Fiverr when they need additional help. I did purchase this "how-to course" on Fiverr after all. Lastly, I felt important info was glazed over, rather than giving me useful this is how to do it instructions.
I spent 3 weeks with this course, every word that came out of your mouth is educative. thank you very much. you Inspire me
A lot of useful tips and information. Carlos knows a lot about social media, marketing and strategies for both.
I liked this curse cause it was pretty straightforward and full of tips easy that I applied to my social media from the first day I started the lessons.
Very insightful, easy-to-understand explanation of a TON of material in a short time.
Loved it. It will certainly challenge me to implement this stuff - but I can see what I have done wrong the last year - so now to getting it done!
I did not get any information about Fiverr building in course 3 as Carlos indicated I would however he included it in the final course. That needs to be fixed.
Very informative and very well done. Definitely worth the money. I'll probably look at completing other courses.

Very inspiring i liked how everything was presented very easy to understand.
I have been using social media for my business for the past year and a half there's so much to learn i have completed a social media course before but i found it difficult to follow a lot of what the course was teaching.
I have learned a lot from this course.
I THROUGHLY ENJOYED THIS COURSE.
Always a great pleasure to learn new things from Fiverr.
New to social media. Too much information to digest. Well worth the time.
good information but i couldn’t access just the pieces i wanted without “prerequisites”

I love this course, it has so much information about how you can master the social media world.

I am very happy yo have choosen this course and will sure put them to practice to see more great result to come along the way. 

There is always something we can learn about so go ahead and get this course as you can learn so much from here. 

Thank for thia educational course.
Great course, very informative and inspiring!

Make sure you complete this course and then implement the advice. I have wasted so much money on FB ads by not being focused on what is really the most important thing. Getting engagement and building a tribe. I had already started to come to that conclusion after 3 years of banging my head against the wall. What this course has done and Gil has done, is to give me a roadmap and a set of instructions on how I can get the most out of my efforts. Of course, once you have a map the important thing is to get on the road and get going. :-)

Nick R. abanak.com
the course was helpful and covered a broad range of aspects that can help any online business. I definitely plan to put the advice and training to good use.
So far so good!

Hello Fiverr,
I'm happy to be writing this review. This was like going to a convention center event because the information was for a wide audience, hence general.
Most of the details I've learned about this subject are from other sources and there's is still much more to learn. 
I took this course on Fiverr just for the badge.
